name: Space Arms Race
description:
SPACE ARMS RACE

This is a short (less than 10 minutes) game in which you control a spaceship protecting the Earth from invaders. Breach the enemy defenses, dodge bullets and upgrade your ship to be ready for a final showdown with the alien mothership!

Controls

[W/A/S/D] or [Up/Left/Down/Right Arrows] to move

[F], [K] or [Space] to shoot

[R] to reset on the game over or success screens

Instructions

The goal is to survive the onslaught of enemy ships and beat the boss at the end of the level. Your shield bar is on the bottom left of the screen. 

The energy bar on the bottom right is filled over time and when an enemy ship is destroyed. Fill it up to upgrade your spacecraft up to 3 times and regain full shield!

The game was created using DragonRuby Game Toolkit. Sound effects come from a Trix Sound Pack shared here: https://phillipp.itch.io/nokiajamresources
